grim_darkness_skirmish.name: Grim Darkness Skirmish
grim_darkness_skirmish.description: Sci-fi skirmish battles in the far future with many unique and possibly familiar factions.

grim_darkness.name: Grim Darkness
grim_darkness.description: Sci-fi battles in the far future with many unique and possibly familiar factions.

space_wars.name: Space Wars (Beta)
space_wars.description: Sci-fi battles in a galaxy a significant distance away. A battle between the Dark Side and the Light Side to control the galaxy.

fantasy_realms_skirmish.name: Fantasy Realms Skirmish (Beta)
fantasy_realms_skirmish.description: Fantasy skirmish battles in the realms with many unique and possibly familiar factions.

fantasy_realms.name: Fantasy Realms
fantasy_realms.description: Fantasy battles in the realms with many unique and possibly familiar factions.

ancients.name: Ancients (490BC to 1066 AD)
ancients.description: Ancients skirmish battles with some added twists and a focus on adding interesting rules and choices.

world_war_two.name: World War Two
world_war_two.description: World War Two battles with some added twists and a focus on adding interesting rules and choices.

gunpowder.name: Napoleonic Era (18th-19th Century) (Beta)
gunpowder.description: 18th and 19th Century battles with gunpowder focusing on skirmish-sized engagements.

weird_west.name: Weird West Skirmish
weird_west.description: Sci-fi skirmish battles set in the american civil war of another time.

third_age.name: The Third Age (Beta)
third_age.description: Skirmish battles in a familiar fantasy world.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: One model per round may use this weapon instead of any other weapons. This weapon ignores cover bonuses.

musician.name: Musician
musician.description: Once per round a friendly unit within 3" may re-roll a single failed Initiative test when sprinting.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: Once per round a friendly unit within 3" may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

champion.name: Champion
champion.description: Once per round a friendly unit within 3" may re-roll a single failed Accuracy or Strength test when attacking.

leader.name: Leader(Infantry)
leader.description: When this unit is activated, up to 2 other friendly units of X types within 6" may choose to activate for free if they have not activated yet and perform the same actions as this unit. Friendly units of X type within 6" may use this unit's Courage and Initiative value when taking skill tests. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of X type unless that unit is also a Leader and attacking in Melee.

leader_x.name: Leader
leader_x.description: When this unit is activated, up to 2 other friendly units of X types within 6" may choose to activate for free if they have not activated yet and perform the same actions as this unit. Friendly units of X type within 6" may use this unit's Courage and Initiative value when taking skill tests. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of X type unless that unit is also a Leader and attacking in Melee.

support.name: Support
support.description: When a, friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" activates, this unit may choose to activate for free if it has not activated yet and perform the same actions as that unit. This unit may not be targetted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly Infantry unit.

support_x.name: Support
support_x.description: When a friendly unit of X type within 6" activates, this unit may choose to activate for free if it has not activated yet and perform the same actions as that unit. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of X type.

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.flavor: It seems luck has gone our way. Or maybe it's something more...
lucky.description: Use when taking a skill test. You may re-roll that test and it may not be re-rolled again. This may be used once per round.

incredible_courage.name: Incredible Courage
incredible_courage.flavor: Even in the darkest of times, moments of great courage can occur.
incredible_courage.description: Use when a unit takes a Courage test. That unit gains +2 Courage for that test. This may be used once per round.

battlefield_reserves.name: Outflanking Reserves
battlefield_reserves.flavor: Sometimes assets are most useful finding an alternate route around the enemy.
battlefield_reserves.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _outflanking reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.

hidden_deployment.name: Hidden Deployment
hidden_deployment.flavor: Staying hidden and waiting for the right moment to strike can have a devastating effect.
hidden_deployment.description: Any number of _Infantry_, _Artillery_ or _Fortification_ units, one point per pair may be placed in hidden deployment instead of deployed on the field. See the section for hidden units in the core rules for details on how hidden units work.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Hits must be assigned to this model or another model in this unit with Guardian before other models.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: This model causes X Melee hits with no AP when it successfully charges an enemy unit.

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction.

exposed.name: Exposed
exposed.description: This model may receive shock even from weapons that it can't be damaged by.

assault.name: Assault
assault.description: Models with this weapon may make a free shoot action after moving at -1 Accuracy. They may not shoot again this round.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.description: When shooting with this weapon, a model may choose to fire twice with it. If it does, halve both the Short and Long ranges of the weapon.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Multiply hits from this weapon by X. A unit may not take more hits than the number of models in the unit.
blast.notes: Don't pay more than once for range with blast weapons.

emp.name: EMP
emp.description: This weapon gains +2 AP against units with a Damage Table(x).

flame.name: Flame
flame.description: Hits from this weapon ignore any cover bonuses.

ammo.name: Ammo
ammo.description: This weapon may only be fired X times per game.
ammo.pointNotes: Always apply this rule last or your numbers will be off.

scoped.name: Scoped
scoped.description: This weapon ignores the Long Range penalty.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: This model may ignore terrain and other models without the Fly special rule when moving.

deployable.name: Deployable
deployable.description: As an action, this model can be set up on the field. It may not be used to control or contest objectives and may not be targeted by abilities.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: This unit may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ before the game begins.

ambush_large.name: Ambush
ambush_large.description: This unit may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ before the game begins.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: When this model arrives on the field, it may make a free Move action. This action may not move within 12" of any enemy units.

outflank.name: Outflank
outflank.description: This unit may be placed in _Outflanking Reserves_ before the game begins.

bomb.name: Bomb
bomb.description: This weapon may be used at any time during a unit's movement. It must still use a Shoot action to fire.

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.description: Roll a die when this model loses a wound. On a value of X or less that wound is not lost.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: This weapon may engage and fight models up to X" away. Enemy models must still move into base contact unless they also have reach.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: This model may re-roll X Save tests per round.

wounds.name: Wounds
wounds.description: This model has X lives that it may lose before it is killed. If a unit contains multiple models with Wounds, damage must be assigned to an already damaged model before being assigned to any other model.

medic.name: Medic
medic.description: Whenever a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

non_combat.name: Non-combatant
non_combat.description: This model may never control or contest objectives, and may not score secondary objectives.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: This model is treated as having X models per base (for the purposes of abilities that interact with models) that it may lose before it is killed. If a unit contains multiple models with Swarm, damage must be assigned to an already damaged model before being assigned to any other model.

crew.name: Crew
crew.description: This weapon requires X models to operate effectively. When the amount of crew is reduced to half or less, this weapon suffers -1 to hit.

evasive.name: Evasive
evasive.description: Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit at a range of more than 12".

stealth.name: Evasive
stealth.description: Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit at a range of more than 12".

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Enemies without _Damage Table(X)_ hit by this weapon reduce their Save value by 1 (after AP) to a minimum of 5.

deadly_poison.name: Deadly Poison
deadly_poison.description: Enemies without _Damage Table(X)_ hit by this weapon reduce their Save value by 2 (after AP) to a minimum of 5.

critical.name: Critical
critical.description: Enemy units add X to _Damage Table(X)_ rolls when hit by this weapon at Short range.

deadly.name: Deadly
deadly.description: Models hit by this weapon suffer X hits instead of 1. Additional hits must be assigned to the same model.

armored_front.name: Heavy Armor(Front)
armored_front.description: This model gets +1 Save when hit in its front arc.

vulnerable_side_rear.name: Vulnerable(Side, Rear)
vulnerable_side_rear.description: This model gets -1 Save when hit in its Side arc or -2 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

vulnerable_rear.name: Vulnerable(Rear)
vulnerable_rear.description: This unit gets -1 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

furious.name: Furious
furious.description: When this model charges, Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.description: When this model shoots, Accuracy rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.

crack_shot.name: Crack Shot
crack_shot.description: Hits rolls of 1 or 2 from shooting attacks made by this model ignore the benefit of cover.

stubborn.name: Stubborn
stubborn.description: This model adds 1 to Courage tests when removing Shock.

reluctant.name: Reluctant
reluctant.description: This model subtracts 1 from Courage tests when removing Shock.

power.name: Power
power.description: This unit may cast X Powers at any point during its movement. To cast, roll a D10 and if the result is equal to or less than the power's cast value it is successful. A unit may only successfully cast each power once per turn. Up to X times per round, this model may attempt to dispel a Power cast within 24". Roll a D10 and if the value is equal to or lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the power is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power. If this model is locked in Melee, it may only target units in the combat. This ability may not be used against enemy units in melee with friendly units.

shocking.name: Shocking
shocking.description: A unit hit by this weapon gains X additional Shock.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Up to X times per round, this model may attempt to dispel a Power cast within 24". Roll a D10 and if the value is equal to or lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the power is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power.

defensive.name: Defensive
defensive.description: This model increases its Save by X.

hover.name: Hover
hover.description: This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: This unit may ignore low obstacles of 1" or less in height when moving.

walker.name: Walker
walker.description: This unit may ignore low obstacles of 1" or less in height when moving.

repair.name: Repair
repair.description: At any point during this unit's activation, if within 3" of a _Vehicle_ unit, roll one die. On an X or less the vehicle may remove one critical damage.

damage_table_titan.name: Damage Table(Titanic)
damage_table_titan.description:
When this model would be killed, roll a D10 adding the amount it failed the save by plus the number of critical damage tokens it has and refer to the following: 
 * Glance(1-3): Take one additional shock. 
 * Slowed(4-5): The unit permanently halves its movement. 
 * Stunned(6-7): The unit permanently suffers -1 Courage. 
 * Damaged(8-9): The unit permanently suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Panic(10-11): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. 
 * Destroyed(12+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Catastrophic(14+): The unit crashes down and all units within 6" gain 3 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

damage_table_monster.name: Damage Table(Monster)
damage_table_monster.description:
When this model would be killed, roll a D10 adding the amount it failed the save by plus the number of critical damage tokens it has and refer to the following: 
 * Glance(1): Take one additional shock. 
 * Slowed(2-3): The unit permanently halves its movement. 
 * Stunned(4-5): The unit permanently suffers -1 Courage. 
 * Damaged(6-7): The unit permanently suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Panic(8-9): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(10+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Fall(12+): The unit crashes down and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

 * Slowed(2-3): The unit permanently halves its movement. 
 * Stunned(4-5): The unit permanently suffers -1 Courage. 
 * Damaged(6-7): The unit permanently suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Fire(8-9): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(10+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Explosion(12+): The unit explodes and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

damage_table_chariot.name: Damage Table(Chariot)

 * Damaged(6-7): The unit permanently suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Panic(8-9): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(10+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Crash(12+): The unit explodes and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

damage_table_aircraft.name: Damage Table(Aircraft)
damage_table_aircraft.description:
When this model would be killed, roll a D10 adding the amount it failed the save by plus the number of critical damage tokens it has and refer to the following: 
 * Glance(1): Take one additional shock. 
 * Slowed(2-3): The unit permanently halves its movement. 
 * Stunned(4-5): The unit permanently suffers -1 Courage. 
 * Damaged(6-7): The unit permanently suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Fire(8-9): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(10+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Crash(12+): The unit crashes into the ground and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

 * Shocked(8-9): Take 2 additional shock and immediately take a Courage test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(10+): It is instantly destroyed. 
 * Explosion(12+): The unit explodes and all units within 6" gain 2 Shock. 


 Mark each time the unit rolls on the table with a critical damage token. If that token is removed, the effect of the table is removed. If a unit contains multiple models with Damage Table(x), hits must be assigned to models with a critical damage token first.

catches_fire.name: Catches Fire
catches_fire.description: This unit suffers the "Fire" result on the Vehicle Damage table on rolls of (6-8) instead of (7-8).

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: This unit requires an extra shock to take break tests.

resist.name: Protect
resist.description: This unit gets +X to its Resist rolls.

open_topped.name: Open-Topped
open_topped.description: Units inside this transport may take a single fire action when activated. Up to X models total may fire their weapons.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Once per activation, this model may ignore models and any terrain when making a Move action.

transport.name: Transport
transport.description: This model may carry X _Infantry_ models inside of it. Units may spend a Move action to embark or disembark from this model. To disembark, measure a Move action originating from this model's edge. To embark, the unit must all get within 1" of this model. If this model is destroyed while units are embarked, each model inside must take a single Save with no AP and then the unit takes 3 Shock. If this unit makes two Move actions, units may not embark or disembark from this unit.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: After firing, a unit must spend 1 action to reload this weapon before it can be fired again.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon may ignore the Long Range penalty and any Cover bonuses. You may choose which model is hit even if it has Leader.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: You may choose which model is hit even if it has Leader and these hits may not be reassigned to other friendly units.

aircraft.name: Aircraft
aircraft.description: Enemy units suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model. This model may ignore terrain and other models when moving. This model may only turn up to 90 degrees. When activated, it must first take a free move action its full movement distance in a straight line. If it ends its move off the table, place it back on any table edge. Its activation then ends. Enemy models may not engage this unit in Melee unless they have the Fly rule. This model may not control objectives.

leeching.name: Leeching
leeching.description: Roll a D10 each time an enemy model fails a Save from this weapon. On a 1 or 2 this model regains one Wound.

team.name: Team
team.description: This weapon requires X models to operate effectively. It suffers -1 Accuracy for each model under this number.

gun_shield.name: Gun Shield
gun_shield.description: This model gains +1 to its Save when hit in its front arc.

smoke.name: Smoke
smoke.description: Choose a location on the battlefield within range of this weapon and if a hit is successful, place a 3" diameter smoke marker at the target location. If the weapon fires multiple shots and more than one lands on target, place any additional smoke markers in contact with the edge of the first hit. Smoke markers block line of sight and models inside or partially obscured by smoke markers gain the benefit of Soft Cover. At the end of the round, roll a D10 for each smoke marker. On a 5 or less the smoke marker is removed.

side_skirts.name: Side Skirts
side_skirts.description: This model gains +1 to its Save when hit in its side arcs from weapons with AP 4 or less.

fanatical.name: Fanatical
fanatical.description: This unit is treated as having +2 Courage for all break tests and does not gain shock from close combat.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description: If this weapon hits its target, that unit gets -1 Strength and -1 Accuracy for its next attack.

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.description: This unit may treat impassable water terrain as difficult terrain.

scatter.name: Scatter
scatter.description: When choosing a target for this weapon, choose a specific model in the unit. If this weapon misses, use D10 scattering to determine the landing point of the shot relative to that model. If it lands within 1" of a different unit, that unit is hit instead.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description: This weapon gets +2 AP against targets with Save 10 or higher.

salvo.name: Salvo
salvo.description: This weapon always hits at -1 Accuracy. When scattering results from this weapon, it hits the closest unit within 3" instead of just 1".

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.description: You may choose to overcharge this weapon and gain +1 AP. If you do, any hit rolls of 10 cause the firer to take 1 Save roll.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: The firer must take 1 Save roll for each hit roll of 10.

pistol.name: Pistol
pistol.description: This weapon may be used instead of a model's other weapons even while engaged in close combat.

strider.name: Strider
strider.description: This model can cross difficult and dangerous terrain without penalty.

rending.name: Rending
rending.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 have +1 AP.

indirect.name: Indirect
indirect.description: This weapon may target units out of line of sight at -1 Accuracy.

anti_air.name: Anti-air
anti_air.description: This weapon gets +1 to hit units with the Aircraft special rule.

titanic.name: Titanic
titanic.description: When this unit is activated it may only perform one action and benefit from abilties which trigger when the unit is activated once. It may then be activated a second time to perform its second action.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: One model in this unit may use this weapon instead of any other weapons. This weapon ignores cover bonuses.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: Enemy units hit by this weapon must re-roll successful Save rolls of 1.

lance.name: Lance
lance.description: This weapon gets +1 AP when used during a Charge.

leader.name: Leader(Infantry)
leader.description: When this unit is activated, up to 2 other friendly units of X types within 6" may choose to activate for free if they have not activated yet and perform the same actions as this unit. Friendly units of _X_ type within 6" may use this unit's Courage and Initiative value when taking skill tests. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of _X_ type unless that unit is also a Leader and attacking in Melee.

leader_x.name: Leader
leader_x.description: When this unit is activated, up to 2 other friendly units of _X_ types within 6" may choose to activate for free if they have not activated yet and perform the same actions as this unit. Friendly units of _X_ type within 6" may use this unit's Courage and Initiative value when taking skill tests. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of _X_ type unless that unit is also a Leader and attacking in Melee.

support.name: Support
support.description: When a, friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" activates, this unit may choose to activate for free if it has not activated yet and perform the same actions as that unit. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly _Infantry_ unit.

support_x.name: Support
support_x.description: When a friendly unit of _X_ type within 6" activates, this unit may choose to activate for free if it has not activated yet and perform the same actions as that unit. This unit may not be targeted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly unit of _X_ type.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: When this unit is activated, friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" may choose to activate and perform the same actions as this unit.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Strength.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at -1 Strength.

accurate.name: Accurate
accurate.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at +1 Accuracy.

unreliable.name: Unreliable
unreliable.description: Attacks with this weapon are made at -1 Accuracy.

terrain.name: Terrain
terrain.description: This unit may be placed anywhere on the field during deployment, more than 12" from any enemy units or deployment zones. Once placed, this unit is treated as terrain and may not be controlled or activated by the owning player.

impassable.name: Impassable
impassable.description: This model may not be crossed by X unit types.

clearable.name: Clearable(5)
clearable.description: _Infantry_ units within 3" of this model may take a Clear action to attempt to clear this obstacle. Roll a D10 and on a roll of 5 or less this obstacle is cleared.

garrison.name: Garrison
garrison.description: Up to X models or a gun with X or less Crew may occupy this model in the same way models occupy a building. If this model is destroyed while units are embarked, each model inside must take a single Save with no AP and then the unit takes 3 Shock.

soft_cover_x.name: Soft-Cover
soft_cover_x.description: This model provides soft cover to X models in it.

soft_cover.name: Soft-Cover
soft_cover.description: This model provides soft cover to models behind it.

hard_cover_x.name: Hard-Cover
hard_cover_x.description: This model provides soft cover to X models in it.

hard_cover.name: Hard-Cover
hard_cover.description: This model provides hard cover to models behind it.

skirmishers.name: Skirmishers
skirmishers.description: This unit has +1 Save when hit by a shooting attack, +1 to initiative tests when sprinting and has a 3“ coherency instead of a 2“ coherency if all models in it have this rule.

musician.name: Musician
musician.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Initiative test when sprinting.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

champion.name: Champion
champion.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Accuracy or Strength test when attacking.

lethal.name: Lethal
lethal.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 from this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1. Additional hits must be assigned to the same model.

brutal.name: Brutal
brutal.description: This weapon gains +1 AP at Short range.

courageous.name: Courageous
courageous.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Courage test per round.

marksmen.name: Marksman
marksmen.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Accuracy test per round.

fighters.name: Fighter
fighters.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Strength test per round.

vigilant.name: Vigilant
vigilant.description: This unit may re-roll one failed Initiative test per round.

motivated.name: Motivated
motivated.description: When this unit activates, it may automatically remove one Shock point.

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: This unit increases its Movement characteristic by 1".

trained.name: Trained
trained.description: This unit increases its Initiative characteristic by 1.

infiltrators.name: Infiltrator
infiltrators.description: This unit may be set aside in reserves before the match begins if all models have outflank. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated you may place the unit within 6" of a table edge over 12" away from enemy units.

breachers.name: Breacher
breachers.description: Enemy units do not benefit from cover when hit by an attack made by this unit at short range.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: This unit increases its Courage characteristic by 1".

survivors.name: Survivor
survivors.description: Once per round a model in this unit may re-roll a Save roll".

unwavering.name: Unwavering
unwavering.description: Once per round this unit may automatically pass a Break test.

aggressive.name: Aggressive
aggressive.description: This unit may perform a free Aim action before Charging.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: This unit gains +1 Save when Charged.

tenacious.name: Tenacious
tenacious.description: Models in this unit count as one additional model for the purposes of controlling objectives.

careful.name: Careful
careful.description: This unit may perform a free Standby action after performing a Move action.

fearful.name: Fearful
fearful.description: This unit suffers -1 to Courage tests when removing Shock.

slowed.name: Slowed
